Package assignment1.tests

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Test1
    TEST 1 (Assignment 1.1) Tests the simulator by displaying one game graphically using the simple prey and the random predator as agents.
    Test2
    TEST 2 (Assignment 1.1) This test runs many simulations in order to calculate both the mean and the standard deviation of game lengths.
    Test3
    TEST 3 (Assignment 1.2) Tests the Iterative Policy Evaluation against the random predator's policy and then prints the state-value function for some states.
    Test4
    TEST 4 (Assignment 1.3) This test runs the Policy Iteration algorithm for various values of the discount factor and outputs the number of iterations run for each case.
    Test5
    TEST 5 (Assignment 1.4) This test calculates the optimal policy using the Value Iteration algorithm and then runs and displays a simulation to check the behaviour of the optimal agent.
    Test6
    TEST 6 (Assignment 1.4) This test runs the Value Iteration algorithm for various values of the discount factor and outputs the number of iterations run for each case.
    Test7
    TEST 7 (Assignment 1.5) This test compares the level of performance obtained by using the original space of states vs.
    Test8
    This class tests that the reduced state space indeed works as expected by first calculating the optimal agent and then displaying its behaviour.
